title: Child's Play Strip!
description: Occasionally at the Child's Play Charity Dinner & Auction Mork will put a custom strip on the block. Just as frequently, the request will get lost for a very long time, only to sheepishly surface much later. Thanks so much to this mysterious donor man, who had a couple suggestions and a heroic self insert as his wish. We are only too happy to oblige! Child's Play's mission continues apace, after an explosive PAX East and the placement of our very first Game Specialist in Scotland. It's all made possible by your donations, and we're inspired by your faith.
excerpt: Videogaming-related online strip by Mike Krahulik and Jerry Holkins. Includes news and commentary.
text: Occasionally at the Child's Play Charity Dinner & Auction Mork will put a custom strip on the block. Just as frequently, the request will get lost for a very long time, only to sheepishly surface much later. Thanks so much to this mysterious donor man, who had a couple suggestions and a heroic self insert as his wish. We are only too happy to oblige! Child's Play's mission continues apace, after an explosive PAX East and the placement of our very first Game Specialist in Scotland. It's all made possible by your donations, and we're inspired by your faith. We have a VERY novel variant of #Fridabe for you today, particularly for the Marvel SNAP enthusiasts among you: — Penny Arcade (@PA_Megacorp) May 29, 2025 Ryan, Dabe, and I will be joined by Snap hero Dekkster from noon PST to 3, with a big bag of codes for this year's PAX card back, Gabe's kick ass Miles Morales, and extra treats. Roll through around noon and obviously GLHF on your code quest! (CW)TB out.
html:
Occasionally at the Child's Play Charity Dinner & Auction Mork will put a custom strip on the block. Just as frequently, the request will get lost for a very long time, only to sheepishly surface much later. Thanks so much to this mysterious donor man, who had a couple suggestions and a heroic self insert as his wish. We are only too happy to oblige! Child's Play's mission continues apace, after an explosive PAX East and the placement of our very first Game Specialist in Scotland. It's all made possible by your donations, and we're inspired by your faith.

We have a VERY novel variant of #Fridabe for you today, particularly for the Marvel SNAP enthusiasts among you:

— Penny Arcade (@PA_Megacorp) May 29, 2025

Ryan, Dabe, and I will be joined by Snap hero Dekkster from noon PST to 3, with a big bag of codes for this year's PAX card back, Gabe's kick ass Miles Morales, and extra treats. Roll through around noon and obviously GLHF on your code quest!

(CW)TB out.
